Catholic Organization

Turtle | RDF/XML | N-Triples | JSON-LD | GitHub
catholic-organization:
a
owl:Ontology
dct:contributor
Roberta Padlina, project coordinator and software developer, University of Basel, Switzerland
Prof. Dr. Ueli Zahnd, Faculty of Theology, University of Basel, Switzerland (en)
dct:creator
Hans Cools, MD, knowledge engineer, ontologist, software developer, Basel University, Switzerland
dct:description
Formal description of catholic organization, general subclasses, related classes, properties, and instances.
dct:license
http://creativecommons.org/ licenses/ by/ 3.0/
dct:publisher
Universities of Basel, Bern, and Zürich, Switzerland
dct:title
An ontology about catholic organization
owl:versionInfo
2020-06-11

Classes

rdfs:comment

a

catholic-organization:SecularClergy
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Catholic organization whose member does not take religious vows and does not live in an institution.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
catholic-organization:
rdfs:label
secular clergy (en)
rdfs:subClassOf
